mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (SELLERID, IMAGE, CATEGORY, PRODUCTNAME, PRICE, OPTION1, OPTION2, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{image}, #{category}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{option1}, #{option2}, #{description});
mapper.select: SELECT U.userName, U.phoneNumber, U.address, U.companyName, P.productName, P.option1, P.option2, P.price FROM USER U JOIN PRODUCT P ON U.ID = P.sellerID WHERE p.ID = #{id}

SELECT p.*, u.companyName AS companyName FROM product p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.sellerId = u.id WHERE 1=1
AND p.category = #{category}
AND p.productName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
AND u.companyName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
ORDER BY p.price ASC
ORDER BY p.price DESC
ORDER BY RAND()
SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{count}
